title: Day 470
content:
# Day 470

Tonight was truly remarkable. I embarked on a lovely date with my beloved, leaving my precious child under the care of my dear mother. Upon my return, my mother shared an interesting tale. It turns out that my little one acted just like Jack Jack from The Incredibles when she realized that her grandmother couldn't feed her. She whined and fussed until her mother returned home.

![](https://miro.medium.com/0*pJnXW2AW7JJym8nU.jpg)

It was quite amusing, for as soon as her mother arrived, sweet Sloan calmed down and found solace in her warm embrace. Truly, since her tender existence began, breastfeeding has been her way of finding peaceful slumber. I cannot blame her, for it is the natural course she has been accustomed to.

I am filled with deep gratitude as I reflect upon the kindness of my beloved mother. She selflessly watched over my precious child while I enjoyed a delightful evening with my partner. It was a time of relaxation and joy, where we savored delicious food, shared laughter with cherished friends, and engaged in trivia. And to top it all off, we indulged in delightful ice cream treats, relishing every heavenly bite. Yet, it is my mother to whom my appreciation extends the deepest. Her loving care ensured my child's safety and happiness, granting me the opportunity to partake in these cherished moments of respite and celebration.

You might be wondering why is this mf writing like he is Shakespeare. Well guess what!?

The power of language experiences a rebirth through the intricate workings of artificial minds. It brings a lighthearted amusement to the soul, imagining that one can converse with an AI in the style of Shakespeare himself. In the days of old, such eloquent prose was commonplace, where people conversed with grandiosity and flair. Words carried weight and beauty, painting the air with poetic artistry. Yet, as we chuckle at the pompousness of the past, we also find ourselves humbled by the capabilities of this technological era. AI tools, such as my humble companion chatGPT, can recreate the linguistic tapestry of bygone days. Oh, what a splendid jest it is to envision the awe of our ancestors, were they able to witness the marvels that surround us today.

Or if they could experience memes.

![](https://miro.medium.com/1*0XPKd7-NMpmXaUg88ccTog.png)

I love memes. Shakespeare's writing is beautiful but nothing can convey a message like a well crafted meme!

7/5/23

Conor Jay Chepenik
